data.text: Masagi yii ɠa Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI yeezu, eɠɛ ziɛi é yeizu,
Ɛsɛ ka ɗa ɠisiɛ, ga nii kpein é kɛɛzu pagɛ,
Nui a telebo fai ta sɔle fai ɠɛɛna,
Gaazulɛɛi ta waso zɛnvui,
Zɔi é yeemaleʋebosu, é faazeikpasuiti kɛ, naa zɔlɔɔgi zu ɠa wɔɔlɔ,
Niiti ti ta-ɓɛtɛi zɔlɔɔsu zɛɛi zu,
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ta-zuɲɔi ɠa ɗa li ga tiye,
Ɲamaba nuiti ta ɗa ʋilɛ pele ɠɔɔngugi ʋolu,
Fizɔgɛ nu zei fiilɛ zosuʋɛ sokogi zu pɛlɛ ɠɔmaʋɛ,
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nui yiimai ɠa ga faa ɲɔu ɠɛɛ vai,
Maaɠolo ɓakɔi a zeelina waso nui ma, zɔi é la dɛ faa mɔinmɔin kwɛɛ, naa ɓalaa ɠa ɗa ɠi sɔlɔɔ,
Telebo nui21:12 telebo nui: Tati pelei taɠili ɓalaa ka ga nii: telebo GALAGI ɠa ɗa ɠida naa kpein bu, nii é ɠɛɛzu faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ta-ʋɛlɛi wu,
Nui nii é la woilosu maawɔin nui ná-kpee wooi ma,
Faanɛɛi é ɠɛɛzu dɔɔɠuzu, naa ɠa ɗa ziiɠaawanai ɠaayei.
Toɠa ga koozunɛ vaa telebo nui ʋɛ, sɔle fai a ɠɛna ɠɛa,
Nui nii é zeɠezu ɠi pagɔi ma ʋelei ʋa,
Zɔi ɓɔɠɔyiimai nɛai bɛ, toɠa kpalai ɠwɛɛ,
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nui ɠa é ga telebo nui unmɔɔ ganii,
Fizɔgɛ nu zei zooi ta zu naa vɔai,
Ɠima nui zeizuʋɛ, nu ɠa ɗa ani naavolo ʋagɔiti ka ná, ta gulɔ makɛgaiti,
Zɔi é ɠaaɓaazu, é ɠɛ ga telebo nu, ta wooɠɛɠila nu, sii zu ɠa ɠooza,
Ɠima nui ɠa laalɛɛna taa wolai wu, nii salaʋusu ɠɛzɛɠɛzɛgiti ti maaɓɛɛzu,
Zɔi é ɓaazu daaʋɛ maazu ta nɛgi,
Ɲɛɛɠulasu nui ɠa ga waso nui, ta gaazulɛɛ nui,
Ɲaka nui ɠa ɗa za, tɔɔzei ziima vaiti daa la zeelizu,
Yeenɔpɛ, toɠa gaazuɠulapɔi laawu,
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ta-zalaɠai ɠa ga ziimaziɛ ganii,
Zɛɛ zeelei undaa ɠa ʋili,
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nui ɠa ɗa ɓɔɠɔ ɠula ga lada nu,
Nuɓusɛi ná-ɠimalai, ta ná-keleɠelegi ta ná-faazeikpasui,
Ta ɗa sooiti maaɠili kɔɔɠɔ voloi laalɔɠɔma,
